Curve.cpp

00001 #include "Curve.h"
00002 
00003 namespace jvgs
00004 {
00005     namespace math
00006     {
00007         Curve::Curve()
00008         {
00009             length = 0.0f;
00010         }
00011 
00012         Curve::~Curve()
00013         {
00014         }
00015 
00016         float Curve::getLength() const
00017         {
00018             return length;
00019         }
00020 
00021         void Curve::calculateLength()
00022         {
00023             /* Calculate length. First, take a simple guess. The real length
00024              * will probably be smaller. */
00025             float simpleGuess = getLengthGuess();
00026             float increment = 1.0f / simpleGuess;
00027 
00028             /* Now approximate the real length. */
00029             length = 0.0f;
00030 
00031             /* getPoint(0.0f) equals start, so... */
00032             Vector2D previous = getPoint(0.0f), current; 
00033             for(float t = increment; t <= 1.0f; t += increment) {
00034                 current = getPoint(t);
00035                 length += previous.getDistance(current);
00036                 previous = current;
00037             }
00038         }
00039     }
00040 }
